page.title: 07A day in the Life
page.content: I wake up most mornings with my mother at 7.00am.I walk downstairs to turn on the telly and the fire.After washing and dressing it's a mad rush to get my cup of tea and biscuits down and get ready before 8 o'clock for my mother to go to work.I walk down my Nan's to wait before I go out and talk to my friends.Normally I call for J.J. he tries to do stunts on his bike.Most times I go up into my bedroom and play records.We meet friends in the park and play rounders.I have dinner at my Nans,mashed potatoes and sausage.In the afternoon we go up the factories then down the football field.At 6.00pm I go in for tea,sandwiches and fruit. Mum says I can stay outside until 8.30 I don't go very far usually up the park with my friends.After watching TV and some supper I talk to Mum about the day.After reading in bed it's zzz.
